  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

      • addInvitationForReceivingUser

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<?> addInvitationForReceivingUser(Invitation invitation)
        Description copied from interface: InvitationsDatabaseService
        Create an invitation document for the receiving user's received invitations in this service's provider database.

        Updates the invitation's ID to that of the newly created document

        Specified by:
        addInvitationForReceivingUser in interface InvitationsDatabaseService
        Parameters:
        invitation - the invitation being sent to the user.
        Returns:
        a task containing the result of trying to create the invitation document.

      • getUserPendingInvitations

        public void getUserPendingInvitations(IUser user)
        Description copied from interface: InvitationsDatabaseService
        Query this service's provider database for the given user's received invitations that have InvitationStatus equal to PENDING.

        On complete, calls InvitationsDatabaseServiceSubject.notifyObserversPendingInvitations(List) to notify observers that the invitations are ready to read.

        Specified by:
        getUserPendingInvitations in interface InvitationsDatabaseService

      • addInvitationsSnapshotListener

        Specified by:

      • notifyObserversPendingInvitations

        public void notifyObserversPendingInvitations(java.util.List<Invitation> invitations)
        Description copied from interface: InvitationsDatabaseServiceSubject
        Notify this subject's observers that the requested received invitations are ready to be read.

        See also: InvitationsDatabaseServiceObserver.onUserPendingInvitations(List)

        Specified by:
        notifyObserversPendingInvitations in interface InvitationsDatabaseServiceSubject
        Parameters:
        invitations - the requested pending invitations list.
